data.name: Rowlet
data.flavorText: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Litten
data.flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

data.name: Popplio
data.flavorText: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Rockruff
data.flavorText: It's considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

data.name: Pikipek
data.flavorText: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses holes for food storage and for nesting.

attacks.name: Nosedive
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

data.name: Togedemaru
data.flavorText: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.text: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.name: Shiinotic
data.flavorText: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokémon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores

data.name: Litten
data.flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

data.name: Oranguru
data.flavorText: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.

attacks.name: Psychic

data.name: Passimian

data.name: Zygarde
data.flavorText: This is Zygarde's form at times when it uses its overwhelming power to suppress those who endanger the ecosystem.

data.name: Mewtwo
data.flavorText: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

abilities.name: Mind Report
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Supporter card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Phione
data.flavorText: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

abilities.name: Whirlpool Suction
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. If you do, discard all cards attached to this Pokémon and put it on the bottom of your deck.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Eevee-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Ascension DNA
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokémon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokémon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

attacks.name: Joy Maker-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: It's in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Psyduck
data.flavorText: Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it normally passes the time spacing out and doing as little as possible.

data.name: Necrozma
data.flavorText: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.

attacks.name: Barrier Attack
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Special Laser
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.name: Mew
data.flavorText: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

abilities.name: Bench Barrier
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent's attacks.

attacks.name: Psypower
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Troubleshooting
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Special Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, heal 80 damage from it.

attacks.name: Abnormal Overheating
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Critical Error-GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 10 cards and discard them. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Mismagius
data.flavorText: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

data.name: Regigigas
data.flavorText: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

data.name: Aipom
data.flavorText: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Charizard
data.flavorText: This Pokémon was created by Mewtwo to prove that copies can be even more powerful than their originals.

abilities.name: Roaring Resolve
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Continuous Blaze Ball
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

data.flavorText: Mewtwo was on a rampage searching for meaning to its existence in this world when Giovanni suppressed and controlled its power.

rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, they may heal 10 damage from each of their Pokémon.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

data.name: Glaceon
data.flavorText: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below –75 degrees Fahrenheit.
